ModMetaData.name: Ushankas Glitterworld Uprising
ModMetaData.author: Ushanka
ModMetaData.description: You look high over the heads of your friends and acquaintances. You stare at the blue, tinted sky and see a little spark blinking from nothingness. Is it a memory? A dream, or a destination? Or is itâ€¦ Glitterworld? \nGlitterworld Uprising adds 11 new machines, 2 resources, and 7 items, each with unique abilities. If you enjoy diving into a dangerous world build upon ultra technology, corruption, and desire for perfection, then this mod is for you.
